6.Details: Don't forget this important event in the club's calendar.

7.Title: Blow Away the Cobwebs
7.Details:
Gordon Philpot has planed an extra set of walks for the Saturday between Christmas and New Year. They are circular walks starting at the Red Lion in Milfield (01668 216224). It involves car pooling (no bus). You can park at the rear of the pub - just let the manager know before setting off walking. The Pub is open for coffee from 9.00am and food and drinks in the afternoon.

See this map for the walk details. One walk is 5½-6 miles. The other between 10 and 13½ miles depending upon whether you choose to walk the loops or the shortcuts at two points on the route.

Let Gordon know (0191-2529345) if you are interested in participating.

8.Title: Hadrian's Challenge
8.Details: Daniel Rogers is holding and exhibition of the photographs he took documenting the club's challenge walk this summer along a 25 mile section of Hadrian wall

9.Title: Suspension of all activities
9.Details: It is with regret that, following the recent advice from the government, the committee have taken the decision to suspend all St Edwards activities until further notice. This includes Saturday walks, the AGM and committee meetings. Of course, we will continue to monitor developments and advise everyone once the situation improves. Meanwhile, I hope you and your families remain safe & healthy.
